skill.name: pdb-database
skill.description: Access RCSB PDB for 3D protein/nucleic acid structures. Search by text/sequence/structure, download coordinates (PDB/mmCIF), retrieve metadata, for structural biology and drug discovery.
skill.summary: Access RCSB PDB for 3D protein/nucleic acid structures. Search by text/sequence/structure, download ...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No credential access, environment harvesting, or persistence patterns were found. Network usage is limited to documented RCSB endpoints for data retrieval.

content.value_statement: Finding reliable 3D structure data can be slow and fragmented. This skill gives direct search, download, and metadata access to RCSB PDB.
actual_capabilities: Search PDB entries by text or attributes
Run sequence similarity searches with identity and evalue cutoffs
Run structure similarity searches by entry, chain, or assembly
Fetch entry and entity metadata through Data API or GraphQL
Download PDB or mmCIF files from RCSB URLs
Batch fetch multiple entries with rate limiting guidance
limitations: Requires network access to RCSB endpoints
Needs Python packages such as rcsb-api or requests for examples
No offline database or local caching included

use_cases.title: Find high resolution targets
use_cases.description: Search human proteins with resolution filters and retrieve metadata for analysis.

use_cases.title: Explore ligand complexes
use_cases.description: Query structures with specific ligands and download coordinate files for modeling.

use_cases.title: Collect teaching examples
use_cases.description: Fetch classic structures and summaries for lectures and assignments.

prompt_templates.title: Find a structure
prompt_templates.prompt: Search RCSB PDB for hemoglobin and list the first 5 PDB IDs.

prompt_templates.title: Filter by quality
prompt_templates.prompt: Find Homo sapiens entries with resolution better than 2.0 Ã… and return 10 IDs.

prompt_templates.title: Sequence similarity
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a sequence similarity search for this protein sequence and return the top 5 matches.

prompt_templates.title: GraphQL metadata
prompt_templates.prompt: Use GraphQL to fetch title, method, and resolution for PDB ID 4HHB.

output_examples.input: Find recent kinase structures from 2024 and summarize key fields.
output: 5 entries found with release dates in 2024
Top result 7XYZ: X-RAY DIFFRACTION, 1.8 Ã… resolution
Metadata includes title, method, and deposit date for each entry

best_practices: Start with Search API to get IDs before fetching data
Respect rate limits with delays or exponential backoff
Use GraphQL to minimize multiple requests
anti_patterns: Downloading many files without rate limiting
Assuming a PDB ID exists without checking
Using legacy formats when mmCIF is required

faq.question: Which platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: It works in Claude, Codex, and Claude Code with Python examples.

faq.question: Are there request limits?
faq.answer: Yes, RCSB applies rate limits. Use delays or exponential backoff.

faq.question: How do I integrate results into pipelines?
faq.answer: Use the Python API to fetch IDs, then download or parse data.

faq.question: Does it access my local files or secrets?
faq.answer: No, the skill content does not read local credentials or files.

faq.question: What if I get 404 or 429 errors?
faq.answer: Check the PDB ID for accuracy or reduce request frequency.

faq.question: How does it compare to manual web browsing?
faq.answer: It provides programmatic search and batch retrieval for automation.
